trans-unit.source: default_branch - (Optional) The name of the default branch of the repository. NOTE: This can only be set after a repository has already been created, and after a correct reference has been created for the target branch inside the repository. This means a user will have to omit this parameter from the initial repository creation and create the target branch inside of the repository prior to setting this attribute.
trans-unit.target: default_branch -（可选）存储库的默认分支的名称。注意：只有在已经创建存储库之后，并且已经为存储库内的目标分支创建了正确的引用之后，才能设置此项。这意味着用户必须在初始存储库创建时忽略此参数，并在设置此属性之前在存储库内部创建目标分支。

trans-unit.source: default_cache_behavior (Required) - The default cache behavior for this distribution (maximum one).
trans-unit.target: default_cache_behavior （必需）-此分发的默认缓存行为（最大数量）。

trans-unit.source: default_character_set - (Optional) The default character set to use when a table is created without specifying an explicit character set. Defaults to "utf8".
trans-unit.target: default_character_set -（可选）在不指定显式字符集的情况下创建表时要使用的默认字符集。默认为“ utf8”。

trans-unit.source: default_client_id - The default client ID.
trans-unit.target: default_client_id -默认客户端ID。

trans-unit.source: default_cluster_version - Version of Kubernetes the service deploys by default.
trans-unit.target: default_cluster_version -默认情况下服务部署的Kubernetes版本。

trans-unit.source: default_collation - (Optional) The default collation to use when a table is created without specifying an explicit collation. Defaults to utf8_general_ci. Each character set has its own set of collations, so changing the character set requires also changing the collation.
trans-unit.target: default_collation （可选）在不指定显式排序规则的情况下创建表时使用的默认排序规则。默认为 utf8_general_ci 。每个字符集都有自己的排序规则集，因此更改字符集还需要更改排序规则。

trans-unit.source: default_cooldown - Time between a scaling activity and the succeeding scaling activity.
trans-unit.target: default_cooldown -伸缩活动和后续伸缩活动之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: default_ip_address - The IP address selected by Terraform to be used with any provisioners configured on this resource. Whenever possible, this is the first IPv4 address that is reachable through the default gateway configured on the machine, then the first reachable IPv6 address, and then the first general discovered address if neither exist. If VMware tools is not running on the virtual machine, or if the VM is powered off, this value will be blank.
trans-unit.target: default_ip_address -通过Terraform所选择的IP地址与任何使用置备此资源配置。只要有可能，这就是通过计算机上配置的默认网关可访问的第一个IPv4地址，然后是第一个可访问的IPv6地址，然后是第一个一般发现的地址（如果都不存在）。如果VMware工具未在虚拟机上运行，​​或者VM已关闭电源，则该值为空白。

trans-unit.target: default_key_flag -（可选）主密钥的标识。值“ 1”表示默认主密钥，值“ 0”表示密钥。更改它会得到一个新密钥。

trans-unit.source: default_local_network_gateway_id - (Optional) The ID of the local network gateway through which outbound Internet traffic from the virtual network in which the gateway is created will be routed (forced tunneling). Refer to the Azure documentation on forced tunneling. If not specified, forced tunneling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: default_local_network_gateway_id -（可选）本地网络网关的ID，来自创建该网关的虚拟网络的出站Internet通信将通过该ID进行路由（强制隧道）。请参阅有关强制隧道的 Azure文档。如果未指定，则禁用强制隧道。

trans-unit.source: default_local_network_gateway_id - The ID of the local network gateway through which outbound Internet traffic from the virtual network in which the gateway is created will be routed (forced tunneling). Refer to the Azure documentation on forced tunneling.

trans-unit.source: default_mode - (Optional) Optional: mode bits to use on created files by default. Must be a value between 0 and 0777. Defaults to 0644. Directories within the path are not affected by this setting. This might be in conflict with other options that affect the file mode, like fsGroup, and the result can be other mode bits set.

By default this is set to false. This value is deprecated: autogenerated buckets are shared by all clusters in the same region, so deleting the bucket could adversely harm other dataproc clusters.
trans-unit.target: delete_autogen_bucket （可选，不建议使用）如果将其设置为true，则在销毁群集时，如果未指定显式的 staging_bucket （即，依赖于自动生成的存储桶），则该自动生成的存储桶也将作为群集销毁的一部分被删除。默认情况下，它设置为false。不建议使用此值：自动生成的存储桶由同一区域中的所有集群共享，因此删除存储桶可能会对其他dataproc集群造成不利影响。

trans-unit.source: deployment_groups - (Optional) Specify the deployment groups details.
trans-unit.target: deployment_groups -（可选）指定部署组详细信息。

trans-unit.source: deployment_id - (Optional) The deployment id you want to get
trans-unit.target: deployment_id -（可选）要获取的部署ID

trans-unit.source: deployment_id - (Required) The ID of the deployment that the stage points to
trans-unit.target: deployment_id -（必需）阶段指向的部署的ID

trans-unit.source: deployment_maximum_percent - (Optional) The upper limit (as a percentage of the service's desiredCount) of the number of running tasks that can be running in a service during a deployment. Not valid when using the DAEMON scheduling strategy.
trans-unit.target: deployment_maximum_percent -（可选）在部署过程中可以在服务中运行的正在运行的任务数的上限（以服务的requiredCount的百分比表示）。使用 DAEMON 调度策略时无效。

trans-unit.source: deployment_minimum_healthy_percent - (Optional) The lower limit (as a percentage of the service's desiredCount) of the number of running tasks that must remain running and healthy in a service during a deployment. Not valid when using the DAEMON scheduling strategy.
trans-unit.target: deployment_minimum_healthy_percent -（可选）在部署过程中必须保持服务在运行中且运行状况良好的正在运行的任务数的下限（作为服务的requiredCount的百分比）。使用 DAEMON 调度策略时无效。

trans-unit.source: deployment_mode - (Optional) The deployment mode of the broker. Supported: SINGLE_INSTANCE and ACTIVE_STANDBY_MULTI_AZ. Defaults to SINGLE_INSTANCE.
trans-unit.target: deployment_mode -（可选）代理的部署模式。支持： SINGLE_INSTANCE 和 ACTIVE_STANDBY_MULTI_AZ 。默认为 SINGLE_INSTANCE 。

trans-unit.source: deployment_mode - (Required) Specifies the mode that is used to deploy resources. This value could be either Incremental or Complete. Note that you will almost always want this to be set to Incremental otherwise the deployment will destroy all infrastructure not specified within the template, and Terraform will not be aware of this.
trans-unit.target: deployment_mode -（必需）指定用于部署资源的模式。该值可以是 Incremental 或 Complete 。请注意，您几乎总是希望将其设置为“ Incremental 否则部署将破坏模板中未指定的所有基础结构，并且Terraform将不会意识到这一点。

trans-unit.source: deployment_option - (Optional) Indicates whether to route deployment traffic behind a load balancer. Valid Values are WITH_TRAFFIC_CONTROL or WITHOUT_TRAFFIC_CONTROL.
trans-unit.target: deployment_option -（可选）指示是否将部署通信路由到负载均衡器之后。有效 WITH_TRAFFIC_CONTROL 或 WITHOUT_TRAFFIC_CONTROL 。

trans-unit.source: deployment_ready_option - (Optional) Information about the action to take when newly provisioned instances are ready to receive traffic in a blue/green deployment (documented below).
trans-unit.target: deployment_ready_option -（可选）有关新配置的实例准备好接收蓝/绿部署中的流量时要采取的操作的信息（如下所述）。

trans-unit.source: deployment_style - (Optional) Information about the type of deployment, either in-place or blue/green, you want to run and whether to route deployment traffic behind a load balancer (documented below).
trans-unit.target: deployment_style -（可选）有关要运行的部署类型（就地部署或蓝色/绿色）以及是否将部署流量路由到负载均衡器后面的信息（如下所述）。

trans-unit.source: deployment_type - (Optional) Indicates whether to run an in-place deployment or a blue/green deployment. Valid Values are IN_PLACE or BLUE_GREEN.
trans-unit.target: deployment_type -（可选）指示是运行就地部署还是运行蓝色/绿色部署。有效 IN_PLACE 或 BLUE_GREEN 。

trans-unit.source: deployment_type - This field could show deployment_type of members. It would return UNKNOWN if there is no members, and return VIRTUAL_MACHINE|PHYSICAL_MACHINE if all Edge members are VIRTUAL_MACHINE|PHYSICAL_MACHINE.
trans-unit.target: deployment_type -此字段可以显示成员的deployment_type。如果没有成员，则返回UNKNOWN；如果所有Edge成员均为VIRTUAL_MACHINE | PHYSICAL_MACHINE，则返回VIRTUAL_MACHINE | PHYSICAL_MACHINE。

trans-unit.source: deprecated - (Optional, Defaults to false) Whether the thing type is deprecated. If true, no new things could be associated with this type.
trans-unit.target: deprecated -（可选，默认为false）是否不推荐使用Thing类型。如果为true，则没有新的事物可以与此类型相关联。

trans-unit.source: (Deprecated) locality - (map of Locality hints, Optional) A mapping of Locality attributes to apply to the machine that assist in data center placement. NOTE: Locality hints are only used at the time of machine creation and not referenced after. Locality is deprecated as of CloudAPI v8.3.0.
trans-unit.target: (Deprecated) locality -（“局部性提示”映射，可选）适用于计算机的“局部性”属性映射，有助于数据中心放置。注意：局部性提示仅在计算机创建时使用，此后不再引用。从 CloudAPI v8.3.0开始不推荐使用本地性。

trans-unit.source: deregister_on_destroy(bool: true) - Determines if the job will be deregistered when this resource is destroyed in Terraform.
trans-unit.target: deregister_on_destroy (bool: true) -确定在Terraform中销毁该资源时是否将注销该作业。

trans-unit.source: deregister_on_id_change(bool: true) - Determines if the job will be deregistered if the ID of the job in the jobspec changes.
trans-unit.target: deregister_on_id_change (bool: true) -确定如果jobspec中的作业ID发生更改，是否将注销该作业。

trans-unit.source: deregistration_delay - (Optional) The amount time for Elastic Load Balancing to wait before changing the state of a deregistering target from draining to unused. The range is 0-3600 seconds. The default value is 300 seconds.
trans-unit.target: deregistration_delay -（可选）在将注销目标的状态从耗尽更改为未使用之前，弹性负载平衡要等待的时间。范围是0-3600秒。默认值为300秒。

If this happens, Terraform will wish to update the device upon subsequent applying which will cause the volume to be detached and reattached indefinitely. Please use with caution.

trans-unit.source: dictionary_key_threshold - (Optional) A float that represents the fraction of the total number of non-null rows. To turn off dictionary encoding, set this fraction to a number that is less than the number of distinct keys in a dictionary. To always use dictionary encoding, set this threshold to 1.

trans-unit.source: Diff is called with the current state and the configuration. The resource provider inspects this and returns a diff, outlining all the changes that need to occur to the resource. The diff includes details such as whether or not the resource is being destroyed, what attribute necessitates the destroy, old values and new values, whether a value is computed, etc. It is up to the resource provider to have this knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Diff 使用当前状态和配置调用 Diff。资源提供者将对此进行检查并返回差异，以概述需要对资源进行的所有更改。差异包括详细信息，例如是否要销毁资源，必须销毁什么属性，旧值和新值，是否计算值等。取决于资源提供者的知识。

trans-unit.source: -diff=false - Display diffs of formatting changes
trans-unit.target: -diff=false -显示格式更改的差异

Note: If SSDs are not attached, it also contains the HDFS data blocks and Hadoop working directories.

trans-unit.source: disks - Information about each of the disks on this virtual machine or template. These are sorted by bus and unit number so that they can be applied to a vsphere_virtual_machine resource in the order the resource expects while cloning. This is useful for discovering certain disk settings while performing a linked clone, as all settings that are output by this data source must be the same on the destination virtual machine as the source. Only the first number of controllers defined by scsi_controller_scan_count are scanned for disks. The sub-attributes are:
trans-unit.target: disks -有关此虚拟机或模板上每个磁盘的信息。它们按总线和单元号排序，以便可以按克隆时资源期望的顺序将它们应用于 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源。这对于执行链接克隆时发现某些磁盘设置很有用，因为此数据源输出的所有设置在目标虚拟机上必须与源虚拟机相同。仅扫描由 scsi_controller_scan_count 定义的第一个控制器的磁盘。子属性是：

trans-unit.source: dkim_tokens - DKIM tokens generated by SES. These tokens should be used to create CNAME records used to verify SES Easy DKIM. See below for an example of how this might be achieved when the domain is hosted in Route 53 and managed by Terraform. Find out more about verifying domains in Amazon SES in the AWS SES docs.
trans-unit.target: dkim_tokens -SES生成的DKIM令牌。这些令牌应用于创建用于验证SES Easy DKIM的CNAME记录。请参阅以下示例，了解如何将域托管在Route 53中并由Terraform管理时如何实现。在 AWS SES文档中找到有关在Amazon SES中验证域的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: dns - (Optional) Settings for controlling the DNS response details.
trans-unit.target: dns -（可选）用于控制DNS响应详细信息的设置。

trans-unit.source: dns - (Optional, IP Network Only) List of DNS A record names for the instance. You can specify up to eight DNS A record names for each interface on an IP network. These names can be queried by instances on any IP network in the same IP network exchange.
trans-unit.target: dns -（可选，仅IP网络）实例的DNS A记录名称列表。您最多可以为IP网络上的每个接口指定八个DNS A记录名称。这些名称可以由同一IP网络交换中任何IP网络上的实例查询。

trans-unit.source: dns - (Optional, set of strings) Set of DNS servers.
trans-unit.target: dns -（可选，字符串集）DNS服务器集。

trans-unit.source: dns - A map of DNS configuration attributes. See below for details on the contents of the dns attribute.
trans-unit.target: dns -DNS配置属性的映射。有关 dns 属性内容的详细信息，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: dns - Array of DNS servers for the interface.
trans-unit.target: dns -接口的DNS服务器阵列。

trans-unit.source: dns1 - (Optional) First DNS server to use. Defaults to 8.8.8.8
trans-unit.target: dns1 -（可选）使用的第一个DNS服务器。默认为 8.8.8.8

trans-unit.source: dns2 - (Optional) Second DNS server to use. Defaults to 8.8.4.4
trans-unit.target: dns2 -（可选）要使用的第二个DNS服务器。默认为 8.8.4.4

trans-unit.source: dns_address - (Required) The IP address of the DNS server.
trans-unit.target: dns_address -（必需）DNS服务器的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: dns_config - (Optional, block) See DNS Config below for details.
trans-unit.target: dns_config -（可选，阻止）有关详细信息，请参见下面的 DNS Config。

trans-unit.source: dns_config - (Required) A complex type that contains information about the resource record sets that you want Amazon Route 53 to create when you register an instance.
trans-unit.target: dns_config -（必需）一种复杂类型，其中包含有关您希望在注册实例时希望Amazon Route 53创建的资源记录集的信息。

trans-unit.source: dns_config - (Required) This block specifies the DNS configuration of the Profile, it supports the fields documented below.
trans-unit.target: dns_config -（必需）此块指定配置文件的DNS配置，它支持下面记录的字段。

trans-unit.source: dns_domain - (Optional) Network interface-specific DNS search domain for Windows operating systems. Ignored on Linux and possibly other opearating systems - for those systems, please see the global DNS settings section.
trans-unit.target: dns_domain -（可选）Windows操作系统的特定于网络接口的DNS搜索域。在Linux和其他可能的操作系统上被忽略-对于这些系统，请参阅“全局DNS设置”部分。

trans-unit.source: dns_entry - The DNS entries for the VPC Endpoint. Applicable for endpoints of type Interface. DNS blocks are documented below.
trans-unit.target: dns_entry -VPC端点的DNS条目。适用于 Interface 类型的端点。DNS块记录在下面。

trans-unit.source: dns_ip_addresses - A list of IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory or connector.
trans-unit.target: dns_ip_addresses -目录或连接器的DNS服务器的IP地址列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_ips - (Required) A list of forwarder IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: dns_ips -（必需）转发器IP地址列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_manage_zones - (Optional) Whether the apikey can modify the accounts zones.
trans-unit.target: dns_manage_zones -（可选）apikey是否可以修改帐户区域。

trans-unit.source: dns_manage_zones - (Optional) Whether the team can modify the accounts zones.
trans-unit.target: dns_manage_zones -（可选）团队是否可以修改帐户区域。

trans-unit.source: dns_manage_zones - (Optional) Whether the user can modify the accounts zones.
trans-unit.target: dns_manage_zones -（可选）用户是否可以修改帐户区域。

trans-unit.source: dns_name - (Optional) DNS name.
trans-unit.target: dns_name -（可选）DNS名称。

trans-unit.source: dns_name - The DNS name for the filesystem per documented convention.

trans-unit.target: dns_name -ELB的DNS名称

trans-unit.source: dns_name - The DNS name.
trans-unit.target: dns_name -DNS名称。

trans-unit.source: dns_name - The fully qualified DNS name of this zone, e.g. terraform.io..
trans-unit.target: dns_name -该区域的标准DNS名称，例如 terraform.io. 。

trans-unit.source: dns_nameservers - (Optional) An array of DNS name server names used by hosts in this subnet. Changing this updates the DNS name servers for the existing subnet.
trans-unit.target: dns_nameservers -（可选）此子网中的主机使用的DNS名称服务器名称的数组。更改此设置将更新现有子网的DNS名称服务器。

trans-unit.source: dns_nameservers - DNS Nameservers of the subnet.

trans-unit.source: dns_nameservers - See Argument Reference above.
trans-unit.target: dns_nameservers -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.source: dns_opts - (Optional, set of strings) Set of DNS options used by the DNS provider(s), see resolv.conf documentation for valid list of options.
trans-unit.target: dns_opts -（可选，字符串集）DNS提供程序使用的DNS选项集，有关有效的选项列表，请参阅 resolv.conf 文档。

trans-unit.source: dns_policy - (Optional) Set DNS policy for containers within the pod. One of 'ClusterFirst' or 'Default'. Defaults to 'ClusterFirst'.
trans-unit.target: dns_policy -（可选）为容器中的容器设置DNS策略。“ ClusterFirst”或“默认”之一。默认为“ ClusterFirst”。

trans-unit.source: dns_prefix - (Required) DNS prefix specified when creating the managed cluster.

trans-unit.source: dns_prefix - (Required) The DNS Prefix to use for the Container Service master nodes.
trans-unit.target: dns_prefix -（必需）用于容器服务主节点的DNS前缀。

trans-unit.source: dns_prefix - The DNS Prefix of the managed Kubernetes cluster.
trans-unit.target: dns_prefix -托管Kubernetes集群的DNS前缀。

trans-unit.source: dns_prefix - (Required) The DNS Prefix given to Agents in this Agent Pool.
trans-unit.target: dns_prefix -（必需）为此代理程序池中的代理程序提供的DNS前缀。

trans-unit.source: dns_primary - Primary DNS server.
trans-unit.target: dns_primary -主DNS服务器。

trans-unit.source: dns_records - (Required) An array that contains one DnsRecord object for each resource record set.
trans-unit.target: dns_records -（必需）一个数组，其中每个资源记录集包含一个DnsRecord对象。

trans-unit.source: dns_search - (Optional, set of strings) Set of DNS search domains that are used when bare unqualified hostnames are used inside of the container.
trans-unit.target: dns_search -（可选，字符串集）在容器内部使用裸的不合格主机名时使用的DNS搜索域集。

trans-unit.source: dns_secondary - Secondary DNS server.
trans-unit.target: dns_secondary -辅助DNS服务器。

trans-unit.source: dns_server - A list of the dns server name.
trans-unit.target: dns_server -dns服务器名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_server_list - (Optional) Network interface-specific DNS server settings for Windows operating systems. Ignored on Linux and possibly other opearating systems - for those systems, please see the global DNS settings section.
trans-unit.target: dns_server_list -（可选）Windows操作系统的特定于网络接口的DNS服务器设置。在Linux和其他可能的操作系统上被忽略-对于这些系统，请参阅“全局DNS设置”部分。

trans-unit.source: dns_server_list - The list of DNS servers to configure on a virtual machine.

trans-unit.target: dns_servers -（可选）用于此NIC的DNS服务器IP地址列表，将覆盖VNet级别的服务器列表

trans-unit.target: dns_servers -（可选）DNS服务器的IP地址列表

trans-unit.target: dns_servers -（可选）以前在Azure上注册的DNS服务器的名称列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_servers - (Required) Specifies an array of dns servers.
trans-unit.target: dns_servers -（必填）指定dns服务器的阵列。

trans-unit.source: dns_servers - DNS list of the domain in the analysis system.
trans-unit.target: dns_servers -分析系统中域的DNS列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_servers - The list of DNS servers used by the specified Network Interface.

trans-unit.source: dns_servers - The list of DNS servers used by the virtual network.
trans-unit.target: dns_servers -虚拟网络使用的DNS服务器列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_settings - (Optional) An dns_settings block as documented below.
trans-unit.target: dns_settings -（可选）一个dns_settings块，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: dns_suffix - (Optional) A FQDN for the virtual machines on this network
trans-unit.target: dns_suffix -（可选）此网络上虚拟机的FQDN

trans-unit.source: dns_suffix_list - A list of DNS search domains to add to the DNS configuration on the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: dns_suffix_list -要添加到虚拟机上DNS配置的DNS搜索域的列表。

trans-unit.source: dns_view_zones - (Optional) Whether the apikey can view the accounts zones.

trans-unit.target: dns_view_zones -（可选）用户是否可以查看帐户区域。

trans-unit.target: dns_zones_allow -（可选）用户可以访问的区域列表。

trans-unit.target: document_format -（可选，默认为JSON）文档的格式。有效的文档类型包括： JSON 和 YAML
